bibl.title: Alcman's Partheneion: the Maidens Dance the City.
bibl.note: The fragments of the mythical portion (vv. 1-35) shed light on the relationships between the characters involved in the choral drama and upon the possible meaning of the performance for the community.
bibl.seg: TOO Yun Lee, Alcman's Partheneion: the Maidens Dance the City.

The fragments of the mythical portion (vv. 1-35) shed light on the relationships between the characters involved in the choral drama and upon the possible meaning of the performance for the community.
